Stampede: +10 damage per target, 175 in total

Extra.en: Stampede deals up to full damage to structures,  making it a really strong Siege move. Stampede halts upon going straight through orbs or wells,  still capable of breaking them down.
Extra.de: Stampede deals up to full damage to structures,  making it a really strong Siege move. Stampede halts upon going straight through orbs or wells,  still capable of breaking them down.
